title: (x) Weepies Hideaway display font. Vaguely retro tiki. - Baveuse {Joseph}
content:
Pardon if this has been discussed before. The search function on the site is on strike at the moment and rendering Page Not Found for every keyword so I cannot efficiently review previous posts.

Can anyone ID the font used for THE WEEPIES on the album cover for Hideaway?

[http://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-media/product-gallery/B0015I2O50/ref=c...](http://web.archive.org/web/20100225214825/http:/www.amazon.com/gp/customer-media/product-gallery/B0015I2O50/ref=cm_ciu_pdp_images_0?ie=UTF8&index=0 "http://www.amazon.com/gp/customer-media/product-gallery/B0015I2O50/ref=cm\_ciu\_pdp\_images\_0?ie=UTF8&index=0")

Many thanks.
author: ignatiusx

comments.content:
Hello It is called Baveuse by Ray Larabie.

Hi Joseph, and welcome to Typophile. Do you have a font area of specialization? Nice to have your help here.

- Mike Yanega
